TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPersonalizable

summary.span: 定義應用和擷取個人化狀態的其他管理能力。

span.span: Defines additional management capabilities for the application and extraction of personalization state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了使用`Personalizable`屬性在控制項的屬性，控制項也可以實作額外的管理功能的應用程式和擷取個人化狀態。In addition to using the `Personalizable` attribute on control properties, a control can also implement for additional management capabilities for the application and extraction of personalization state. 例如，需要管理私用的狀態資訊的控制項應該實作這個介面。For example, controls that need to manage private state information should implement this interface. 透過複雜的機制，例如自訂快取解決方案，資料持續性，以主控件或 XML Web service，存取個人化的資料的控制項應該也會實作這個介面。Controls that access personalized data through complex mechanisms, such as custom cache solutions, data persistence to mainframes, or XML Web services, should also implement this interface. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您不應該加入 App_Code 目錄中定義的類別為基礎的類型，則取決於預設的二進位序列化機制。You should not add types based on classes defined in the App_Code directory and then depend on the default binary serialization mechanism. App_Code 為基礎的成品不一致的方式可二進位序列化，因為，還可以在隨機點變更的時間及其組件名稱。App_Code-based artifacts are not consistently binary-serializable due to the fact that they can have their assembly names changed at random points in time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用介面。The following code example demonstrates how to use the interface. 此範例包含參考名為 Web 組件控制項的.aspx 頁面`UrlListWebPart`。The example consists of an .aspx page that references a Web Part control named `UrlListWebPart`. 下列程式碼是範例.aspx 檔案。The following code is the .aspx file for the example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/IPersonalizableCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/IPersonalizableVB.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼是自訂的來源控制項。The following code is the source for the custom control. 這個檔案應該置於 App_Code 目錄中。This file should be placed in the App_Code directory. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/urllistwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/urllistwebpart.vb#2)] 將網頁瀏覽器中的載入。Load the page in a browser. 輸入名稱來代表 URL，然後新增與實際的 URL 開頭`http://`，然後按一下**新增**按鈕以新增 URL。Type in a name to represent a URL, then add an actual URL beginning with `http://`, and click the **Add** button to add the URL.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsDirty As Boolean
public: property bool IsDirty { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示控制項管理的自訂資料是否已變更。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the custom data that a control manages has changed.

value.span: 如果由 介面管理的自訂資料已變更，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the custom data managed with the interface has changed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項所管理的資料已變更時，將控制項視為 「 中途 」。When data managed by a control has changed, the control is considered "dirty." 控制項應傳回`true`如果自訂的資料，就會管理透過介面已經變更。A control should return `true` if the custom data that it manages through the interface has changed. 當控制項傳回`true`從這個屬性，該控制項的屬性值擷取期間會呼叫介面方法實作。If a control returns `true` from this property, the control's interface method implementation is called during property value extraction. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性會自動檢查個人化基礎結構處理 POST 要求的第二個階段。This property is checked automatically by the personalization infrastructure during the latter phases of processing a POST request. 不過，GET 要求傳回的值從就不會檢查屬性。However, for GET requests, the value returned from the property is not checked. 其他事件，必須使控制項才會被視為"dirty"的任何控制項的狀態--受管理的不只是資料-儲存。Some other event has to have caused the control to be considered "dirty" for any control state--not just data managed by --to be saved. 如果控制項可以將本身為 「 中途 」 期間 GET 要求，或如果個人化基礎結構，在某些非常特定界限的情況下會考慮控制"dirty"期間 GET 要求，然後一律進行呼叫。If a control can mark itself as "dirty" during a GET request, or if the personalization infrastructure under some very specific boundary conditions considers a control "dirty" during a GET request, then will always be called. 控制項可以參考其相關聯控制項，並檢查屬性來判斷目前的範圍。A control can reference its associated control and check the property to determine the current scope. 控制項的自訂資料的"dirty"狀態應該是適用於目前的範圍。The "dirty" state of a control's custom data should be appropriate for the current scope. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates use of the property. 此範例的第一個部分是主控網頁控制項。The first part of the example is the Web page that hosts a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/IPersonalizableCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/IPersonalizableVB.aspx#1)] 此範例的第二個部分是自訂的程式碼控制項稱為`UrlListWebPart`。The second part of the example is the code for the custom control called `UrlListWebPart`. 這個檔案應該置於 App_Code 目錄，若要執行範例。This file should be placed in the App_Code directory to run the example. 請注意，原始碼實作屬性。Note that the source code implements the property. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/urllistwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/urllistwebpart.vb#2)] 將網頁瀏覽器中的載入。Load the page in a browser. 輸入名稱來代表 URL，然後新增與實際的 URL 開頭`http://`，然後按一下**新增**按鈕以新增 URL。Type in a name to represent a URL, then add an actual URL beginning with `http://`, and click the **Add** button to add the URL.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Load(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary state) cil managed

param.name: state
param.span: ，包含從基礎資料存放區載入的自訂範圍資料。

span.span: A that contains custom scoped data that was loaded from the underlying data store.

summary.span: 將自訂資料載入至控制項。

span.span: Loads custom data into a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上的控制項，以允許它載入到本身的自訂資料，會呼叫此方法。This method is called on a control to allow it to load custom data into itself. 它也可以傳回值，指出是否將控制項的自訂狀態必須重新寫入至基礎資料存放區，不論是否變更過網頁上的其他個人化資料。It can also return a value that indicates whether a control's custom state must be written back to the underlying data store, regardless of whether any other personalization data on the page has changed. 控制項可以設定自己的自訂屬性，以及執行其他的內部邏輯，根據個人化字典中包含的值。A control can set its own custom properties and carry out additional internal logic based on the values contained in the personalization dictionary. 呼叫這個方法是套用至控制項的個人化資料時所設定的 Web 組件控制項。This method is called by the Web Parts control set while applying personalization data to a control. 您也應該注意的合併行為-與範圍-範圍中所包含的屬性物件。You should also be aware of the merge behavior of -scoped versus -scoped properties contained in the object. `state`參數包含合併的表示法，從基礎資料存放區載入的自訂資料。The `state` parameter contains a merged representation of custom data that was loaded from the underlying data store. 在 範圍，當頁面本身在先前新增的所有值都範圍會是可用。In scope, all the values that were previously added when the page itself was in scope would be available. 在範圍，如果值與相關聯個人化範圍已加入網頁中時的一個值範圍，以及當頁面在不同的值範圍，則會在個人化基礎結構只包含-範圍值 (相對於範圍值) 內`state`參數。In scope, if a value associated with personalization scope had one value added when the page was in scope, and a different value when the page was in scope, then the personalization infrastructure would only include the -scoped value (as opposed to the scope value) within the `state` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範實作方法，在自訂控制項。The following code example demonstrates an implementation of the method in a custom control. 完整的程式碼才能執行此範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節中的類別概觀。For the full code required to run this example, see the Example section in the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/urllistwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/urllistwebpart.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Save(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary state) cil managed

param.name: state
param.span: ，包含從基礎資料存放區載入的自訂範圍資料。

span.span: A that contains custom scoped data that was loaded from the underlying data store.

summary.span: 將自訂屬性和內部狀態資料儲存在控制項的 物件中。

span.span: Saves custom properties and internal state information in the control's object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 伺服器控制項在它自己的自訂屬性以及內部狀態資訊可以儲存中所指定`state`參數。A server control can store its own custom properties and internal state information the specified in the `state` parameter. 資訊會儲存為一系列的名稱/值組。The information is stored as a series of name/value pairs. 它是控制項來使用它在後續透過呼叫期間可辨識的名稱/值組的責任方法。It is the responsibility of the control to use name/value pairs that it can recognize during subsequent calls made to the control through the method. 控制項可以參考其相關聯控制項，並檢查物件來判斷目前的範圍。A control can reference its associated control and check the object to determine the current scope. 自訂狀態資訊應該適用於目前的範圍。Custom state information should be appropriate for the current scope. 請注意，每個值加入至因為個人化基礎結構在合併時，要取決於此物件應該是適當的範圍內的值，與相關聯和-範圍自訂資料在之前將其傳遞至方法。Note that each value that is added to the object should be associated with the appropriate scope value, because the personalization infrastructure depends on this when merging and -scoped custom data prior to passing it to the method. 當使用標準 ASP.NET 實作的 Web 組件，控制項必須確定放置狀態字典中的物件可以序列化，由 ASP.NET類別。When using the standard ASP.NET implementation of Web Parts, controls must ensure that objects placed in the state dictionary can be serialized by the ASP.NET class. 在實務上，這表示下列各項：In practice, this means the following: - 基本的.NET Framework 型別、 字串和陣列，陣列清單、 雜湊表和 hybrid 字典等集合導向.NET Framework 型別會自動序列化。Primitive .NET Framework types, strings, and collection-oriented .NET Framework types such as arrays, array lists, hash tables, and hybrid dictionaries, are automatically serializable. - 提供自己的自訂型別類別能夠序列化和還原序列化字串會被視為可序列化。Custom types that supply their own classes capable of serializing to and deserializing from strings are considered serializable. - 自訂型別可以序列化的類別會被視為可序列化。Custom types that can be serialized by the class are considered serializable. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您不應該加入 App_Code 目錄中定義的類別為基礎的類型，則取決於預設的二進位序列化機制。You should not add types based on classes defined in the App_Code directory and then depend on the default binary serialization mechanism. App_Code 為基礎的成品不一致的方式可二進位序列化，因為，還可以在隨機點變更的時間及其組件名稱。App_Code-based artifacts are not consistently binary-serializable due to the fact that they can have their assembly names changed at random points in time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法，在自訂控制項。The following code example demonstrates implementing the method in a custom control. 完整的程式碼才能執行此範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節中的類別概觀。For the full code required to run this example, see the Example section in the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/urllistwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/urllistwebpart.vb#2)]
